120363420789158776@g.us.message:
*🕊️⚔️ WELCOME TO RECKONING ⚔️🔥*  
*A storm is coming… and only the bold survive.*  
This isn’t just a group — it’s a movement. A gathering of minds, energy, chaos, and clarity. Whether you're a thinker, a warrior, a creator, or a silent observer, in RECKONING, you *belong* — but only if you can handle the heat.  
*We rise. We clash. We thrive.*  
*This is RECKONING.* 💀🔥⚡

*📜 GROUP RULES – BREAK, AND BE BROKEN ⚠️*

1. 🚫 *No 18+ Content* – Keep it clean or get cleaned out.  
2. 📵 *No Spamming* – No floods, no chains, no nonsense.  
3. 🤖 *No Bots Allowed* – If a bot is used, members *will* be kicked out.  
4. 🤐 *Respect All* – No bullying, no hate speech.  
5. 🧠 *Keep It Active, Keep It Smart* – We build, not break.

🌑🔥 *THE VOID REBIRTH — Official Welcome Message*

*Welcome, Wanderers of the Dark.*  
You were lost... but now found — wrapped in the embrace of *Sovereign Lord Vistar✯.*

Today marks your passage into something greater.  
*Welcome to *THE VOID REBIRTH.**

Let chaos breathe — but let the Law of Vistar reign supreme.  
This new world shall bloom in its full glory...  
And *light shall rise even within the deepest shadows.* 🚹

_•↝Bodyshaming or any form of cyber bullying ain't accepted_ *_DON'T BE A BITCH_* _(We no send your papa for here)_

120363420789158776@g.us.message:
*🚪Leaving the Group? Cool.*

Nobody begged you to stay. This ain’t a hotel — it’s *RECKONING*.  
If the heat’s too much, run. We don’t chase, we don’t miss.  
*Weak minds exit. Real ones rise.*  
So take your silence, your drama, and your excuses with you. 🧹💨

*Goodbye and good luck… you’ll need it.* 💀🔥
